text: This is a list of colleges and universities in Bangkok, Thailand. ==Public== * Chulalongkorn University * Kasetsart University * King Mongkut's Institute of Technology Ladkrabang * King Mongkut's Institute of Technology North Bangkok * King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi * Mahachulalongkornrajavidyalaya University * Mahamakut Buddhist University * Mahidol University * National Institute of Development Administration * Rajamangala University of Technology * Ramkhamhaeng University * Silpakorn University * Srinakharinwirot University * Sukhothai Thammathirat University * Thammasat University ==Private== * Assumption University * Bangkok University * Dhurakijpundit University * Dusit Thani College * Kasem Bundit University * Mahanakorn University of Technology * Rangsit University * Ratana Bundit University * SAE Institute Bangkok * Saint John's University * Siam University * Sripathum University * University of the Thai Chamber of Commerce Bangkok * Category:Bangkok
title: List of Bangkok universities
